DESCRIPTION: Join an event so you can be alerted when it starts!
EXTENDED: **{{prefix}}eventjoin [Event ID]** ~ Joins the event if there is space and you have the necessary roles to join this event.
ALREADY_JOINED: You are already RSVP as **Attending** this event.
MISSING_ALLOWED_ROLES: This event can only be joined by someone who has one of the following roles: {{roles}}
